95D9DD6B4093D56DDFF389A2B7B8BF85: A tameable or ridable NPC cannot be used in a sequence. Either set ridable and tameable to false or remove the sequencer modifier.
3D45B5D24A5C28CDE69B1AB70C00E6A0: Base AI Spawner Class, Not Supposed to Be Directly Used in Other Places
9E9744D3405E545FE1BED882658E614C: Missing Character Blueprint asset to do retargeting!
C5F16B9F42FDA77F352A3BB00C1B9C7A: Missing Retargeter asset to do retargeting!
E48FFE554DF62BB14204249459CFA281: Missing Retargeter to retarget the Character Blueprint on the WIldlife Skeletal Mesh.
CB3A85A14C999A1D5B476FBB7000F623: Spawns NPC Characters with customizable options.
BF0029DC4DB651F35AF349ACDF8D93EC: Spawns non-playing characters with customizable options.

ActorFactoryAISpawner.CanCreateActor.NoAIBehavior: A valid NPC Character Definition or Verse AI Behavior class must be specified.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.Despawn.Descript: Despawns any existing AIs belonging to this device
Determines if we need to show the spawn radius or not.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.SpawnOnTimer.Des: Determines whether the AI is spawned on the Spawm Timer countdown, or spawn on events.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.AllowInfiniteSpa: Determines whether the spawner has a total spawn limit or not.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.EnabledAtGameSta: Determines whether the spawner is already enabled when the game starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.SpawnThroughWall: Determines whether this A.I. must spawn within line of sight of the Spawner or if they can spawn behind obstructing walls.
UserOptionDefinition.B872C8364115522BFB7AB09E01646160: Replaces the NPC Behavior script from the Character Definition.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.Reset Total Spaw: Resets the count for the Total Spawn Limit
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.On Eliminated.De: Sends an event to linked device when an AI from this device is eliminated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.On Spawned.Descr: Sends an event to linked device when this device spawns an AI
Sets the maximum number of AIs this spawner can produce during its lifetime.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.SpawnTimer.Descr: Sets the minimum time between spawning AIs. "INSTANT(0)" will spawn the quickest possible but is capped by performance limit.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.SpawnCount.Descr: Sets the number of AIs this spawner can have active at any time. When the spawner activates, it will produce one AI at a time.
UserOptionDefinition.NPCCharacterDefinitionComponent_C.NPCCha: The NPC Character Definition that will be used to spawn the NPC
The extra list of modifiers that will be used to spawn the NPC.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.SpawnRadius.Desc: The maximum distance from the device that an AI can spawn.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_AISpawner_Base_C.DespawnAIsWhenDi: When the device is disabled, this determines whether already spawned AIs remain or are despawned.
